body.p: The Standard does not establish any new principles for intangible assets related to agricultural activity. Rather, an entity follows IAS 38 Intangible Assets. IAS 38 requires an intangible asset, after initial recognition, to be measured at its cost less any accumulated amortisation and impairment losses, or at a revalued amount.
